author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Hey, Luis!
body:
Nice Akira article at animeondvd. Although I hope you'll be posting a review 
with pics from the Lupin oav soon. :) BTW, after searching Sega's Game Jam 
2002 site, I found more pics of the Lupin Typing game through a link at 
http://www.sega-am.com/utop/gamejam2/g_jam2.html . And the official site for 
the game seems to be at 
http://www.wow-ent.co.jp/jpn/products/lupin/lupin_typing/index.html

_________________________________________________________________
Chat with friends online, try MSN Messenger: http://messenger.msn.com
